text: The Oblasts of Ukraine are primary administrative units in Ukraine. There are 24 oblasts in Ukraine. Every oblast is further split into raions. ==List of oblasts== Region Area (sq mi) Population (2010) Pop. density Administrative centre Raions (Districts) 8,069.5 1,291,135 160.00 Cherkasy 4 12,303.1 1,104,241 89.75 Chernihiv 5 3,126.3 903,782 289.09 Chernivtsi 3 12,322.1 3,344,073 271.39 Dnipro 7 10,238.3 4,448,031 434.45 Donetsk 8 5,366.8 1,380,770 257.28 Ivano-Frankivsk 6 12,129.4 2,755,177 227.15 Kharkiv 7 10,988.9 1,091,151 99.30 Kherson 5 7,971.1 1,331,534 167.05 Khmelnytskyi 3 9,493.5 1,014,809 106.90 Kropyvnytskyi 4 10,861.4 1,719,602 158.32 Kyiv 7 10,302.7 2,300,412 223.28 Luhansk 8 8,429.8 2,545,634 301.98 Lviv 7 9,497.3 1,186,452 124.93 Mykolaiv 4 12,861.1 2,387,636 185.65 Odesa 7 11,099.7 1,493,668 134.57 Poltava 4 7,740.2 1,152,576 148.91 Rivne 4 9,202.4 1,166,765 126.79 Sumy 5 5,337.1 1,086,694 203.61 Ternopil 3 10,236.7 1,646,250 160.82 Vinnytsia 6 7,777.6 1,038,223 133.49 Lutsk 4 4,933.2 1,246,323 252.64 Uzhhorod 6 10,494.3 1,805,431 172.04 Zaporizhzhia 5 11,518.2 1,283,201 111.41 Zhytomyr 4 Oblasts
